text: Inomjon Buzrukovich Usmonxo‘jayev (in Cyrillic Uzbek: Иномжон Бузрукович Усмонхўжаев ; in Russian: Инамджан Бузрукович Усманходжаев Inamdzhan Buzrukovich Usmankhodzhayev; 21 May 1930 - 17 March 2017) served as the eleventh First Secretary of the Communist Party of the Uzbek SSR. Usmonxo‘jayev became General Secretary following the disastrous "Cotton Scandal". Usmonxo'jayev died on 17 March 2017 in Fergana, Uzbekistan at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== *World Statesmen - Uzbekistan Category:1930 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Uzbekistani politicians Category:Communists
title: Inomjon Usmonxo‘jayev
